title: Tribeca Film Festival
seo_description: The Tribeca Film Festival 2016, in New York City.
preview: For almost fifteen years, the Tribeca Film Festival has brought audiences downtown to see contemporary independent filmmaking at its best.
contents:
For almost fifteen years, the Tribeca Film Festival has brought audiences downtown to see contemporary independent filmmaking at its best. Robert De Niro, along with investor Craig Hatkoff and film producer Jane Rosenthal, founded the festival in the aftermath of September 11th attacks to help revitalize the Tribeca neighborhood and to remind New Yorkers of their importance in the film industry. Nearly every screening at the ten-day festival is a North American or even world premiere, and oftentimes the director, cast and crew is available for Q&A sessions after the film. While there is sometimes a local focus, films come from around the world, ensuring that audiences see a wide range of  filmmaking perspectives. Photo courtesy of the Tribeca Film Festival.


For more information, visit the Tribeca Film Festival website.
